text: Herbert Feuerstein (15 June 1937 â€“ 6 October 2020) was an Austrian-born German journalist and comedian. ==Career== He worked for and, from 1968, became editor of the German-language newspaper New Yorker Staats-Zeitung. From 1968, he was the editor of the German version of Mad. He also worked as the dub voice of Gilbert Huph in the German-language version of Pixar's The Incredibles. ==Personal life== Feuerstein was born in Zell am See, Austria. He became a German citizen in 1990. Feuerstein died in Erftstadt, Germany on 6 October 2020, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * * fan-site in German * Feuerstein in the German national library Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian movie actors Category:Austrian voice actors Category:Austrian journalists Category:German movie actors Category:German voice actors Category:German comedians Category:German journalists
title: Herbert Feuerstein
